AccuracyForStringLiteral.Notes: How to treat accuracy for string literals as function output arguments.

Remediation.Feedback: Incomplete copy of range. Partial copying of range, found content copied to: '{0}' instead of: '{1}'.

Copy_Range.Notes: Give partial credit if target range copied to skips cells that would result in a non-displayable value

Remediation.Feedback: Inclusion of extraneous/empty cells in ranges should be avoided. Found range: '{0}' in expression: '{1}', does not match the requested range: '{2}'.

FunctionArg_RangeBounds.Notes: Might make this function specific or add other criteria later.

FunctionArg_Missing.Notes: How to treat entry of default values in functions when not requested to do so.

Remediation.Feedback: Specifying the {0} was not required, review {1}

FunctionArg_DefaultValue_Found.Notes: How to treat entry of default values in functions when not requested to do so.

Remediation.Feedback: Requested numeric literal value '{0}' entered incorrectly '{1}'.

FunctionArg_NumericLiteral_OutputValue.Notes: How to treat accuracy for numeric literals as function arguments. May need to define threshold.

Remediation.Feedback: Requested string literal value '{0}' entered incorrectly '{1}'.

FunctionArg_StringLiteral_OutputValue.Notes: How to treat accuracy for string literals as function output arguments.

Remediation.Feedback: Requested numeric literal value '{0}' entered incorrectly '{1}'.

FunctionArg_NumericLiteral.Notes: How to treat accuracy for numeric literals as input function arguments, provided resulting value is correct.

Remediation.Feedback: Requested string literal input value '{0}' entered incorrectly '{1}'.

FunctionArg_StringLiteral.Notes: How to treat accuracy for string literals as input function arguments, provided resulting value is correct.
